phrases: It is not like I am desertin' ya, though.
There is just nothing I can do.
Do not go holdin' it against me,'kay?
Suffer good and long, and then die!
Even though it is the evening, because of that strange light, it is as bright as this.
W- what the hell is that thing?
K- Kuririn- san, o- over there!
He is turned into a Great Ape!
Feels like most of your bones just broke, huh?
Hey, who d'ya think that monster is?
It is the Saiyan, I tell ya, the Saiyan!
There is no way you can stand up to that monster, you know!
But if we cut off his tail, he will return to normal.
Gohan and Yajirobe, you guys circle around in front of him, and get his attention.
I will find an opportunity to cut off his tail from the back!
Y- ya got to be kiddin' me.
You guys do not even know!
Even after he is back to normal, he is still going to have unbelievable strength!
Goku's Ki is almost completely gone!
Dammit, he is moments from death!
Eh, do whatever you want to.
If it is not Kakarrot's kid.
So you have come here just to see your father meet his end, have you?
He was just about to die.
I was right about to finish him off.
I am going to crush him until there is nothing left.
Unfortunately, it appears he has already lost consciousness.
Did you think I would not notice that there was another one of you?
You guys seem to share some worthless attachment for each other, after all.
There is no way this kid would just come strolling back by himself,
so I was just waiting to see what would happen.
Apparently, you know about our tails.
Once I have taken care of Kakarrot, it will be your turn next.
What kind of beast is this?
Even after turning into a monster,
he still has his presence of mind and his guard is flawless.
I do not want to just let you die,
but this guy's Ki is so incredible, l cannot even get close to him.
You guys were mistaken to have challenged me to battle!
If we do not do something...
So, you want to die ahead of your father, do you?
I did not know there was yet another one!
I got nothing to do with this...
I- I got nothing to do with this from here on...
He returned to his original form!
Whatever happens now, it is not my problem...
You want to die so badly that you have made me angry!?
In that case, as you wish, I will kill you, you miserable scum!
Was not a Super Saiyan supposed to be strong?
Maybe the order has been changed.
Do not say I did not warn ya.
Amuse me a little while longer.
Is that the best you can do?
I guess the son of scum...
You may be scum, but it looks like your blood is red, at least.
How can he be so cruel to a child!?
I am sure she must have run out of tears.
She has not fainted, has she?
How about I at least let you die next to your father?
Kakarrot, you are a tough one.
You are still conscious, are you?
Gohan, your daddy's whole body is a mess.
His power should have dropped considerably.
All right, I will do it this way- I will follow my order, and kill Kakarrot first.
After that, I will finish off that bald bastard from earlier.
Finally, I will kill the bastard who cut off my precious tail!
You do not have to beat him...
Your power should be even more incredible than his... even more...
While you are doing that, I will have Kuririn finish him off...
Do you want everyone else's deaths to be in vain?
I am counting on you, Gohan...
For left-behind scum, you are sure giving me a lot of trouble!
You are going to defeat me?
Do not you mess around with Vegeta- sama!
Why did not you tell Gohan to run away?
I am going to give this to you now, Kuririn...
The Genki Dama that I gathered from all over the earth...
What are you going to give me?
Ki that I have collected from everything on earth...
About half of it got away, but I think it will still defeat him, the way he is now...
I do not understand this at all.
I just have to take your hand?
Your bones are broken, are not they?
I am giving it to you now, so take it...
This is a tremendous amount of Ki!
Turn your palm upward, and focus it...
You can make it into a ball...
Gohan are not able to control this kind of Ki...
I cannot make another Genki Dama...
M- make sure you hit him!
Will the Genki Dama that has been entrusted to Kuririn be able to put a stop to Vegeta?
